page.title: 05LEISURE IN BURNHAM
page.content: We have interviewed some people in the {Burnham}area and have sent out questionnaires. After sorting them out we discovered these things. Most people have at least one car. We did not just look at cars, we also looked at peoples shopping habits.The most popular shopping centre was { {Maidenhead}closely followed by {Slough A lot of people shop locally for daily shopping. As well as travelling and shopping we also looked at holidays.The most popular holidays were in {France }and the next best spot was in {Spain.}Most {European} countries were very popular but some people have gone further a field to places like{America,Kenya,Poland {Austria }and{Turkey.}The total number of survey forms that were sent back is 19.
